content.body:
> <@jakea:matrix.org> https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-event-preventdefault - this mentions that calling `preventDefault` can have no effect. Does that mean `event.defaultPrevented` will remain false?

In case the cancelable attribute is falsy, or if the passive listener flag is set, it indeed does nothing.
https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#set-the-canceled-flag
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @jakea:matrix.org
https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-event-preventdefault - this mentions that calling preventDefault can have no effect. Does that mean event.defaultPrevented will remain false?
In case the cancelable attribute is falsy, or if the passive listener flag is set, it indeed does nothing.
https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#set-the-canceled-flag

content.body: annevk: Regarding https://github.com/whatwg/url/issues/815#issuecomment-2275009761 , do you have a recollection of why the ASCII asterisk and double quote are allowed in the domain name by the URL Standard?
content.formatted_body: annevk: Regarding https://github.com/whatwg/url/issues/815#issuecomment-2275009761 , do you have a recollection of why the ASCII asterisk and double quote are allowed in the domain name by the URL Standard?
